system.requirements:
Tier 3: Forbidden Lore (Psykers) +10, WP 45.
Aptitudes: Knowledge, Perception
system.effect: Character counts as possessing Psyniscience as a known skill (+0) even though they are not a psyker. They cannot spend experience to gain additional ranks.

description.value: Character counts as possessing Psyniscience as a known skill (+0) even though they are not a psyker. They cannot spend experience to gain additional ranks.
